TextView.android:text:
After login you get to the main menu. 

Play mission:
 You get a new mission. You can choose between playing this mission or get a new one. 

Latest Pictures:
 Here you can see the latest pictures. 

Own Pictures:
 Get a stream of your own pictures. 

My Favorites:
 Get a stream of pictures from people you follow. 

New Mission:
 Suggest a new mission. 

Snups is a project, that was created at the University of Applied Sciences in Salzburg. It was a corporation of the courses Multimedia Technology and Multimedia Art.
